GK16visa01cu:1: granthārambhe nirvinghena prāripsitaparisamāptikāmo vāṅmayādhikṛtatayā vāgdevatāyāḥ sāṃmukhyamādhatte--
GK16visa01cu:6: dṛṣṭvā bhūritadhvaniprabhṛtikālaṅkāraśāstraṃ muhu- stanmūlañca visṛṣṭamarthamakhilaṃ kāvyaprakāśasya ca /
GK16visa01cu:7: sāhityottaradarpaṇaṃ viśadayannāndayan sajjanān bhaṭṭācāryyamaheśvaro vitanute vijñāpriyāṃ ṭippaṇīm // 2 //
GK16visa01cu:13: ārambhakālasya sthūlatvād yogyatāvaśāt tatpūrvakāle eva sāmmukhyādhānaṃ bodhyam /
GK16visa01cu:14: na ca śloke sāmmukhyādhānabodhakābhāvāt kathamidamābhāṣitamiti vācyam,
GK16visa01cu:15: śaradindvityādi tatsaundaryyakathanarūpastutyā svacetasi tamonāśār'tha prakāśanaprārthanayā ca tallābhāt,
GK16visa01cu:16: stutasyānukūlatvaniyamāt tadānukūlyaṃ pratyevābhīṣṭhaprārthanācca cetasyarthaprakāśe satyapi vighnād granthasya samāptirna bhavatītyate /
GK16visa01cu:19: kāmanayāpi vighnābhāvarūpaviśeṣaṇāṃśo viṣayīkriyate ahaṃ sukhī syāmiti kāmanayā sukhaṃśā iva /
GK16visa01cu:20: prāripsitagranthaparisamāptirūpe phale 'nyadevatāpekṣayā tasyāḥ śīghnakāritvapratipādanāya tadviśeṣaṇamāha--vāṅmayeti--svārthe mayaṭ /
GK16visa01cu:23: tathā ca vāgātmakasya granthasya nirvighnaparisamāptirūpaṃ phalaṃ vāgadhikāriṇyā śīghraṃ dātuṃ śakyameveti darśitam /
GK16visa01cu:32: pāraṃ sāhityavidyābdhergantuṃ vāñchanti ye kṣitau kṛtireṣā taristeṣāṃ viśvanāthamahākaveḥ // 5 //
GK16visa01cu:34: yadihāsti tadanyatra yannehāsti na tat kvacit // 6 //
GK16visa01cu:37: iha khalu sūtrāṇāmevārthaṃ vṛttyā viśadīkurvan granthādau vighnavighātāya avigītasadācāraparamparāprāptatayā
GK16visa01cu:44: vāṅmayetyanena svaśāstravidheyavagvaibhavadātṛtayā hmādidevārādhyatvena bhagavatyāḥ prakṛtārthanirvāhakatvaṃ mcitam /
GK16visa01cu:57: atrādye pāde luptopamāmahimnā śaradindorapi sundararucitvaṃ santataṃ tamaḥ padārthāndhakāranāśakatvaṃ ghaṭapaṭādyakhilārthaprakāśakatvaṃ ca siddhyati /
GK16visa01cu:58: tathā ca ebhiḥ sādharmyaiḥ śaradindugīrdevyorupamānopameyabhāva iti bodhyam /
GK16visa01cu:65: asya granthasya kāvyāṅgatayā kāvyaphalaireva phalavattvamiti kāvyaphalānyāha--
GK16visa01cu:68: caturvargaphalaprāptihi kovyato “rāmādivatpravatitavyaṃ na rāvaṇādivat” ityādiḥ kṛtyākṛtyapravṛttinivṛttyupadeśadvāreṇa supratītaiva /
GK16visa01cu:81: prayojane vatkavye “aṅginaḥ phalenaivāṅgasya phalavattā“iti nyāyāt utkāṃ kāvyaphalapratipādikāṃ
GK16visa01cu:88: nanu kathaṃ kavinoptāditetivṛttānāṃ mālatīmādhavaratnāvalīmṛcchakaṭikādīnāṃ svābhidheyeṣu prāmāṇyam ?
GK16visa01cu:89: nacāpramāṇarūpasya śabdasya śāstratvamiti cedatrāha--- “suvidagdhapramā kāvyaṃ pramāṇaṃ sarvabheva naḥ /
GK16visa01cu:92: natu prakārabhedāḥ prahelikā vyahgyārthaviśiṣṭhā nīrasā vākyaviśeṣāḥ /
GK16visa01cu:93: yathā- ke dārapoṣaṇaratāḥ kā śītalāmbuvāhinī gaṅgā /
GK16visa01cu:94: kaṃ saṃjaghāna kṛṣṇaḥ kaṃ balavantaṃ na bādhate śītam “iti /
GK16visa01cu:108: na yadevaṃ na tadevaṃ yathā praheliketi /
GK16visa01cu:109: nanu rasarūpapramāṇatvepi prakaraṇādeḥ ratyāsvādānantaramasadbhūtatvenārthānarthopadarśanābhāvāddhitāhitapravṛtt inivṛttikāritvaprayojitaṃ kathaṃ hi śāstratvamiti na vācyam /
GK16visa01cu:126: “ekaḥ śabdaḥ suprayuktaḥ samyagjñātaḥ svarge loke kāmadhugbhavati” ityādivedavākyebhyaśca suprasiddhaiva /
GK16visa01cu:138: tathā ca samastakāvyaprayojanam--“kāvyaṃ yaśaser'thakṛteṭha iti yat kāvyaprakāśakāreṇoktaṃ tacca “karoti kīrttiṃ prītiṃ ca” ityatraivoktam,
GK16visa01cu:145: caturvargaprāptirhi vedaśāstrebhyo nīrasatayā duḥkhādeva pariṇatabuddhīnāmeva jāyate /
GK16visa01cu:149: (vi, ṅa) nanu caturvargaphalasādhake vedaśāstre sati kimarthaṃ lokaḥ kāvye pravarttatāmityata āha--caturvargaphalaprāptiriti /
GK16visa01cu:156: nanu tahi pariṇatabuddhibhiḥ satsu vedaśāstreṣu kimiti kāvye yatnaḥ karaṇīya ityapi na vaktavyam /
GK16visa01cu:157: kaṭukauṣadhopaśamanīyasya rogasya sitaśarkaropaśamanīyatve kasya vā rogiṇaḥ sitaśarkarāpravṛttiḥ sādhīyasī na syāt ?
GK16visa01cu:167: tena hetunā tasya kāvyasya svarūpaṃ nirūpyate /
GK16visa01cu:174: (lo, ū) śaktiḥ kavitvabījarūpaḥ saṃskāraviśeṣaḥ yāṃ vinā kāvyaṃ na prasaret,
GK16visa01cu:177: kāvyaparīkṣaṇaṃ didarśayiṣuḥ prācīnakāvyalakṣaṇeṣu prameyavirodhaṃ darśayannāha--tat kiṃ svarūpamityāha--“tadadoṣāviti” taditi kāvyam,
GK16visa01cu:192: “nyakkāro hyayameva me yadarayastatrāpyasau tāpasaḥ so 'pyatraiva nihanti rākṣasakulaṃ jīvatyaho rāvaṇaḥ /
GK16visa01cu:193: dhigdhikchakrajitaṃ prabodhitavatā kiṃ kumbhakarṇena vā svargagrāmaṭikāviluṇṭhanavṛthocchūnaiḥ kimebhirbhujaiḥ” //
GK16visa01cu:205: śakrasya jetāram arthāt meghanādaṃ mama putraṃ dhik dhik,
GK16visa01cu:206: tathā prabodhitavatā prabodhitaṃ prabodhaḥ tadvatā bhāvaktantatvena prabodhavatā kumbhakarṇena vā kiṃ phalamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa01cu:210: kīdṛśaiḥ, mama viluṇṭhane svargo 'pi grāmaṭikā svalpagrāmaḥ,
GK16visa01cu:217: asya śalokasya vidheyāvimarśadoṣaduṣṭatayā kāvyatvaṃ na syāt /
GK16visa01cu:223: (vi, jha) vidheyāvimarśeti--vidheyasya nyakkārasyoddeśyādarimattvāt pūrvanipātāt “anuvādyamanuktvaina vidheyamudīrayet” iti niyamāt /
GK16visa01cu:230: “idamuttamamatiśayini vyaṅgye vācyād dhvanirbudhaiḥ kathitaḥ” ityanena lakṣaṇena dhvaniyuktatvādasya uttamakāvyatvasvīkārāt,
GK16visa01cu:231: tasmādavyāptidoṣa iti---atra doṣasāmānyābhāvo lakṣaṇaghaṭaka iti tadabhiprāyamunnīya idamuktam,
GK16visa01cu:233: anyathā “tathābhūtāṃ dṛṣṭvā nṛpasadasi pāñcālatanayām” ityādiślekaḥ kākusahakṛtadhvanyudāharaṇatayoktvā kathaṃ tenaiva nyūnapadatvadoṣe udāhṛtaḥ
GK16visa01cu:234: kathaṃ vā “kṛtamanumataṃ dṛṣṭaṃ vā yairidaṃ gurupātakam” ityādiślekaḥ raudrarasodāharaṇatvenoktvāpi punaruktadoṣatve udāhṛtaḥ /
GK16visa01cu:239: vidheyatāṃ netumucitasya tatpuruṣasamāsena kavinā guṇībhāvaṃ nītatayā pūrvasiddhatvāt
GK16visa01cu:255: bhujairiti bahuvacanasya tadvyañjakaviśeṣatvāt asaṃlakṣyakamo dhvaniścātra svāmānanānnirvedākhyaḥsaṃcāribhāvaḥ /
GK16visa01cu:259: nanu kaścidevāṃśo 'tra duṣṭo na punaḥ sarvo 'pīti cet,
GK16visa01cu:261: yatra dhvaniḥ sa uttamakāvyatvaprayojaka ityaṃśābhyāmubhayata ākṛṣyamāṇamidaṃ kāvyamakāvyaṃ vā kimapi na syāt /
GK16visa01cu:262: na ca kaṃcidevāṃśaṃ kāvyasya dūṣayantaḥ śratiduṣṭādayo doṣāḥ,
GK16visa01cu:271: nanvaṃśaviśeṣasthitena doṣeṇa aparāṃśādūṣaṇāttadaṃśe kāvyatvaṃ doṣavadaṃśe cākāvyatvaṃ syādata āha--naceti /
GK16visa01cu:284: iha tu doṣasya yadaṅgasya dūṣakatvaṃ tasyākāvyatvam,
GK16visa01cu:285: dhvaneśca yasyotkarṣakatvaṃ tasyottamakāvyatvamiti dvayorna virodhaḥ ityāśaṅkyāha-na ceti /
GK16visa01cu:292: anityadoṣāḥ śrutikaṭuprabhṛtayaḥ tathā hiraudrādirase prarūḍhaśrutikaṭutvasya guṇatvam,
GK16visa01cu:294: arddhepārīndramarddhenaramahaha mahālokamālokya lokāḥ stokāstokāviśeṣāḥ śaraṇamupayayurvāridhiṃ vāridhiṃ vā” //
GK16visa01cu:300: kiñca evaṃ kāvyaṃ praviralaviṣayaṃ nirviṣayaṃ vā syāt,
GK16visa01cu:315: nanvīṣadarthe nañaḥ prayoga iti cettarhi “īṣaddoṣau śabdārthau kāvyam” ityukte nirdeṣayoḥ kāvyatvaṃ na syāt /
GK16visa01cu:318: (vi, ṭha) īṣadarthe naña iti---adoṣāviti naña ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa01cu:326: nirdeṣayoḥ kvacit kadācit kavinādoṣabhāvena nirmitayoḥ kāvyatvaṃ na syāt,
GK16visa01cu:332: nahī kīṭānuvedhādayo ratnasya ratnatvaṃ vyāhantumīśāḥ kintūpādeyatāratamyameva kartum /
GK16visa01cu:340: (vi, ḍa) sati sambhava iti---sphuṭadāṣarahite kadācidīṣaddoṣasya sambhave satītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa01cu:341: uktañceti---yatra rasādīnāmasaṃlakṣyakramāṇām anugamaḥ sphuṭaḥ tatra duṣṭeṣvapi kīṭānuviddharatnādisādhāraṇyena kāvyatā matā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa01cu:347: guṇānāṃ rasaikadharmatvasya “ye rasasyāṅgino dharmāḥ śauryādaya ivātmanaḥ” ityādinā tenaiva pratipāditatvāt /
GK16visa01cu:352: (vi, ḍha) evamadoṣāviti viśeṣaṇaṃ dūṣayitvā saguṇāviti viśeṣaṇaṃ dūṣayitumāha--kiñceti /
GK16visa01cu:356: (lo, au) evamadoṣatvasya kāvyalakṣaṇatvaṃ dūṣayitvā saguṇatvasyāpi dūṣayati /
GK16visa01cu:361: ayamarthaḥ-śabdārthau khalu prācīnoktarītyā nirbhitau rasābhivyañjakau bhavato 'pyanumatau;
GK16visa01cu:363: yadāha sa eva “guṇavṛttyā punasteṣāṃ sthitiḥ śabdārthayormatā“iti /
GK16visa01cu:365: upacārataḥ saguṇau śabdārthau kāvyamiti yaducyata ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa01cu:368: tayoḥ kāvyasvarūpeṇābhimatayoḥ śabdārthayo raso 'sti, na vā ?
GK16visa01cu:371: asti cet ? kathaṃ noktaṃ rasavantāviti viśeṣaṇam /
GK16visa01cu:377: ayamarthaḥ--rasasya sadbhāve eva kāvyatvaṃ tadabhāve veti /
GK16visa01cu:382: yadi guṇābhivyañjakayoḥ śabdārthayoḥ satoreva kāvyalakṣaṇatvamābhimataṃ tadā lakṣaṇasya nyūnapadatvam /
GK16visa01cu:392: śauryyadyāśrayaprāṇyāśraye deśe 'nayā śauryyādimanto deśā iti kenāpi nocyate ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa01cu:394: tathā hi paramparāghaṭakya madhyabhūtasambandhino bahirindriyapratyakṣatve satyeva naikamāropaḥ /
GK16visa01cu:395: yatra tu paramparāghaṭakamadhyabhūtasambandhī na bahīrindriyaprataykṣastatratvevamārepo dṛśyata eva /
GK16visa01cu:396: yathā śīto vāyuruṣṇaṃ jalaṃ sugandhirvāyurittra paramparāsambandhaghaṭakānāṃ madhyabhūtajalāgnipuṣpāvayavānāṃ sūkṣyamatvenāpratyakṣatvāt tādṛśa āropaḥ /
GK16visa01cu:397: prakṛte 'pi bahirindriyāprataykṣasya rasādeśca paramparāsambandhaghaṭakatvāt sambhavatyeva guṇavattāropaḥ śabdārthayoriti /
GK16visa01cu:402: yadi ca tādṛśaropo nāsti tadā kāraṇāntarābhāvasyaiva tatra kalpanīyatvāt /
GK16visa01cu:404: “ārope sati nimittānusaraṇaṃ na tu nimittamasti ityāropaḥ” iti /
GK16visa01cu:405: yastu javākusumasya vahirindriyapratyakṣatve 'pi lohitaḥ sphaṭika ityāropaḥ tatra javākusumaṃ nedṛśaparamparāghaṭakaṃ javākusumasya sphaṭikāvṛttitvāt
GK16visa01cu:406: kintu javākusumasya svacchadravyasānnidhyameva tadrahitaṃ pṛthagevāropanimittamiti sudhībhiravadheyam /
GK16visa01cu:410: tena alaṅkārāḥ kaṭakakuṇḍalādivaditi vacanena alaṅkārasyotkarṣamātrādhāyakatvāt lakṣaṇaṃ parāstamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa01cu:417: etacca etadgranthakṛtā svakṛtāyāṃ kāvyaprakāśaṭīkāyāṃ likhitamapi prācīnagauravaniyantritenātropekṣitam /
GK16visa01cu:418: adoṣatvādīnāṃ tu kāvyalakṣaṇatve prameyārthavirodhaprasaṅga iti tannirākṛtam //
GK16visa01cu:420: nanu “śabdārthau saguṇau” ityanenaguṇābhivyañjakau śabdārthau kāvye prayojyāvityabhiprāya iti cet ?
GK16visa01cu:425: (vi, ta) idānīṃ saguṇatvaviśeṣaṇasya na lakṣaṇaghaṭakatvaṃ kintu kavyupadeśaparatvamityāśaṅkate,
GK16visa01cu:431: na tu svarūpādhāyakatvāmityasya svarūpe lakṣaṇe na niveśaucityamityeva,
GK16visa01cu:443: asyārthaḥ- sarvatra sālaṅkārau kvacittvasphuṭālaṅkārāvapi śabdārthau kāvyamiti /
GK16visa01cu:462: yaḥ kaumāraharaḥ sa eva hi varastā eva caitrakṣapā- ste conmīlitamālatīsurabhayaḥ prauḍhāḥ kadambānilāḥ /
GK16visa01cu:463: sā caivāsmi tathāpi tatra suratavyāpāralīlāvidhau revārodhasi vetasītarutale cetaḥ samutkaṇṭhate //
GK16visa01cu:472: revātīre kṛtasaṅketāyāḥ kulaṭāyāḥ svagṛhe iyaṃ bhāvanā /
GK16visa01cu:473: utkaṇṭhākaraṇaṃ mama yadyapi nāsti tathāpi tatra kṛtasaṅkete revārodhasi revātīre vetasīnāmatarutale suratavyāpārarūpalīlāvidhinimittaṃ cetaḥ samutkaṇṭhate ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa01cu:479: caitrakṣapā api saṅketasthala ivātrāpyaviśiṣṭā ityāha--“tā eva'; iti /
GK16visa01cu:482: ata eva te prauḍhāḥ api mandatvaparyyavasannāḥ vanānilasya prauḍhatve 'pi mandatvaṃ vahabahirbhāvena /
GK16visa01cu:486: tanmate vāyoḥ prauḍhatvaviśeṣaṇānaucityāpatteḥ anye tūnmīlitamālatīnāṃ te ca prauḍhasurabhayo ghrāṇatarpaṇagandhāḥ,
GK16visa01cu:489: tadā kadambānilā ityatra te ca ityasyābhāvāt,
GK16visa01cu:498: (lo, ī) evaṃ kāvyalakṣaṇaṃ dūṣayitvā kāvyaprakāśakṛtaḥ sphuṭālaṅkāravirahodāharaṇe sphuṭālaṅkāraṃ darśayannāha,
GK16visa01cu:502: tadakṛtakapremāsakṛttayā yo 'tivāhitavān sa kaumāraharaḥ varaḥ svayaṃvṛtaḥ,
GK16visa01cu:508: saṃpradāyavidastu sa eva vasantaḥ tā eva varṣā iti manmathoddīpakatvāviśeṣād ṛtudvayasyāpi graha iti vyācakṣate /
GK16visa01cu:516: “sati hetau phalābhāve viśeṣoktiḥ” iti ca lakṣaṇasya vakṣyamāṇatvāt;
GK16visa01cu:521: tathā hi kāraṇābhāve phalāt kāraṇasadbhāve phalābhāvācca vismayasya utthāpitattvāttat sthāyibhāvako 'dbhutarasaḥ /
GK16visa01cu:524: kiṃ vā sa eva rasābhāsādbhutarasasyāṅgamiti prayo 'laṅkāracha,
GK16visa01cu:529: tathā cātra kāraṇabhāvaphalābhāvayorvācakasya naño 'bhāvena tat kalpanāyā vilambenāsphuṭatvāt evaṃ tayorasphuṭatvācca sutarāṃ tanmūladarśitālaṅkārayorasphuṭatvam
GK16visa01cu:531: (lo, u) atra hīti kāraṇābhāve kāryyotpattirvibhāvanā sā cātrāsphuṭā /
GK16visa01cu:535: yadi khalu priyasaṅgamābhāvādīnāṃ kāraṇānāmasadbhāvamukhena varṇanaṃ tadeva tasyāḥ sphuṭatvam /
GK16visa01cu:539: atra ca teṣu satkhapi dhṛtirnotpannetyutkaṇṭhotpattimukhena varṇitam,
GK16visa01cu:541: tadā kāryyānutpatteḥ sphuṭatayoktatvāt viśeṣoktiḥ sphuṭā syāt /
GK16visa01cu:544: evamatra dvayorvibhāvanāviśeṣoktyorasphuṭārthatvāt sphuṭālaṅkāraviraha iti kāvyaprakāśakṛto matam /
GK16visa01cu:547: tathāpi tadubhayārabdhasandehe saṅkarālaṅkārasya sphuṭatvāt kathaṃ sphuṭālaṅkāraviraha iti /
GK16visa01cu:552: rasānvitaṃ kaviḥ kurvan kīrtiṃ prītiṃ ca vindati” //
GK16visa01cu:560: viśeṣaścātra sarasāviti vacane śrutyarthatvena saguṇāviti vacanaṃ samanantaroktarītyānarthakam /
GK16visa01cu:563: “kāvyasyātmā dhvaniḥ“-- iti tatkiṃ vastvalaṅkārarasādilakṣaṇāstirūpo dhvaniḥ kāvyasyātmā,
GK16visa01cu:573: na ca tadapi kāvyameveti vācyaṃ vyaṅgyasyāsvādyatvavaśādeva kāvyātmatvakathanāt /
GK16visa01cu:579: '; ityatra yaḥ pūrṇakalaśo vyaṅgyastasyābodhyatāyāmeva kavestātparyyādatraiva vaicitryeṇa alaṅkāra eva prahelikā /
GK16visa01cu:580: yattu asphuṭākhye guṇībhūte vyaṅgye kṛcchragamyatvaṃ tatra kṛcchragamyatāyāṃ na kavestātparyyamatastasya nātikṛcchragamyatvam,
GK16visa01cu:596: kaṃ saṃjaghāna kṛṣṇaḥ kaṃ balavantaṃ na bādhate śītam” //
GK16visa01cu:599: tathā hi--dārāṇāṃ bhāryyāṇāṃ poṣaṇe ratāḥ ke ?
GK16visa01cu:609: (vi, pha) nanu yadi vyaṅgyo rasa eva kāvyasyātmā tadā vastuno vyaṅgyatve kathaṃ kāvyatvamityāśaṅkate “nanu rasādimātreti” /
GK16visa01cu:612: attā ettha ṇimajjai ettha ahaṃ diasaaṃ paloehi /
GK16visa01cu:613: mā pahia rattiandhia sejjāe maha ṇimajjahisi //
GK16visa01cu:616: (vi, ba) attā ettheti--- “śvaśrūratra nimajjati atrāhaṃ divasakaṃ pralokaya /
GK16visa01cu:618: ” rātryandhatvena kathitātmānaṃ svagṛhe kṛtāvāsaṃ pathikaṃ prati svayaṃ dūtyā uktiriyam /
GK16visa01cu:623: atra puṃścalīvacanena mat śayyāsthānam abhītaṃ samāgacchetyarthamātrasya dhvanitam /
GK16visa01cu:631: ityādau vastumātrasya vyaṅgyatve kathaṃ kāvyavyavahāra iti cet ?
GK16visa01cu:642: anyathā “devadatto grāmaṃ yāti” iti vākye tadbhṛtyasya tadanusaraṇarūpavyaṅgyāvagaterapi kāvyatvaṃ syāt /
GK16visa01cu:645: kāvyasya prayojanaṃ hi rasāsvādasukhapiṇḍadānadvārā vedaśāstravimukhānāṃ sukumāramatīnāṃ
GK16visa01cu:650: (vi, ma) rasavata eva kāvyatvāṅgīkāre bījamāha--kāvyasya prayojanamiti /
GK16visa01cu:658: rasāsvāda eva mukhaṃ piṇḍasya dvāreṇa taduktam--- “svādukāvyarasonmiśraṃ vākyārthamupayuñjate /
GK16visa01cu:681: nanu tarhi prabandhāntarvartināṃ keṣāṃcinnīrasānāṃ padyānāṃ kāvyatvaṃ na syāditi cet ?
GK16visa01cu:684: yattu nīraseṣvapi guṇābhivyañjakavarṇasadbhāvaddoṣābhāvādalaṅkārasadbhāvācca kāvyavyavahāraḥ sa rasādimatkāvyabandhasāmāyādrauṇa eva /
GK16visa01cu:696: yadyapi varṇo guṇasyaiva vyañjako na kriyāyāstathāpi atra varṇapadaṃ varṇādiparaṃ bodhyam /
GK16visa01cu:717: “rasyate iti rasaḥ” iti vyutpattiyogādbhāvatadābhāsādayo 'pi gṛhyante tatra raso yathā--
GK16visa01cu:725: (lo, ai) evaṃ prāktanalakṣaṇānāṃ prameyavirodhaṃ darśayitvā svalakṣaṇāmavatārayati /
GK16visa01cu:727: rasātmakamityatra rasapadenāsaṃlakṣyakamabhedānāṃ sarveṣāṃ parigraha ityāha--rasyata iti /
GK16visa01cu:733: tadābhāsāḥ rasābhāsā bhāvābhāsāśca ādiśabdāt bhāvasya śāntirudayaḥ sandhiḥ śabalatā ca /
GK16visa01cu:735: śūnyaṃ vāsagṛhaṃ vilokya śayanādutthāya kiñcicchanairnidrāvyājamupāgatasya suciraṃ nirvarṇya patyurmukham /
GK16visa01cu:736: vistrabdhaṃ paricumbya jātapulakāmālokya gaṇḍasthalīṃ lajjānamramukhī priyeṇa isatā bālā ciraṃ cumbitā //
GK16visa01cu:741: atra vilokyetyādikrameṇaiva sakalakriyāṇāṃ pūrvāparabhāvaḥ ktvānirddiṣṭo bodhyaḥ /
GK16visa01cu:747: ālokya lajjānamramukhī jātā iti śeṣaḥ mukhena bodhyam /
GK16visa01cu:760: (lo, o) śūnyamiti-śūnyaṃ viviktaṃ vāsagṛhaṃ kelibhavanaṃ vilokya,
GK16visa01cu:762: śayyāyāḥ kiñcidutthāya utthitā bhūtvā śanairmandaṃ niḥ śabdamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa01cu:763: bālā nidrāvyājamuphagatasya priyasya mukhaṃ suciraṃ nirvarṇya dīrghakālaṃ vilokya samyak parīkṣya ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa01cu:764: viśrabdhaṃ niḥ śaṅkaṃ yathā syāttathā paricumbya āsvādya jātapulakā utphullaromāñcāṅkitāṃ
GK16visa01cu:765: gaṇḍasthalīṃ vilokya lajjānamramukhī vrīḍāvanatavadanā satī hasatā priyeṇa ciraṃ
GK16visa01cu:782: ciraṃ nirvarṇanena supto na veti sandehaprabhavo vitarkaḥ,
GK16visa01cu:807: asmai yatpadopasthāpitāya kasmaicit anirvacanīyāya arthāddaśāvatāriṇe nārāyaṇāya namaḥ /
GK16visa01cu:809: uladhito 'pi matsyasya prauḍhoktyā mahattvāt tacchalkasīmni layaḥ /
GK16visa01cu:831: madhu dvirephaḥ kusumaikaṇatre papau priyāṃ svāmanuvartamānaḥ /
GK16visa01cu:835: (vi, ṣa) madhudvirepha iti---maheśatapobhaṅgāyā'kālike vasante jāte tiraścāmapi mānmathakriyāvarṇanamidam /
GK16visa01cu:836: atra priyayā sāhityena madhupānaṃ priyākaṇḍūyanaṃ ca dvirephakṛṣṇasārayo rateranubhāvau /
GK16visa01cu:849: (lo, ā) doṣāḥ punariti---yeṣāṃ sadbhāvena kāvyatvaṃ khaṇiḍatamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa01cu:850: kiṃ svarūpāḥ kimākāreṇa varttante iti pūrvavad vyākhyānam /
GK16visa01cu:863: dehadvāreṇova śabdārthadvāreṇa tasyaiva kāvyasyātmabhūtaṃ rasamutkarṣayantaḥ kāvyasyotkarṣakā ityucyante /
GK16visa01cu:873: iha yadyapi guṇānāṃ rasadharmatvaṃ tathāpiguṇaśabdo 'tra guṇābhivyañjakaśabdārthayorupacaryate /
GK16visa01cu:874: ataśca “guṇābhiñjakāḥ śabdā rasasyotkarṣakāḥ” ityuktaṃ bhavatīti prāgevoktam /
GK16visa01cu:878: (vi, ha) nanu śabdārthadvāreṇa rasotkarṣakatvamalaṅkārarītīnāṃ śabdārthadharmāṇāmeva sambhavati rasamātradharmāṇāmeva guṇānāṃ kathaṃ taddvārakatvaṃ vyākhyātamityata āha---iheti /
GK16visa01cu:880: yadyapi varṇā eva guṇābhivyañjakā iti vakṣyante tathāpi varṇena padaṃtenārthastena ca guṇo vyajyate,
GK16visa01cu:883: tathā vyākhyāne tu guṇānāṃ sākṣādrasopakārakatvenaiva kārikārthaḥ saṃgacchate iti bodhyam /
GK16visa01cu:886: satyam kintūtkarṣahetavaḥ proktā guṇālaṅkārarītaya ityuktau alaṅkārarītyoḥ samabhivāyahāreṇa pāṭhavaśāt tadrītikatvalābhaḥ /
GK16visa01cu:891: ye ca taddharmaviśeṣāntaḥ pātitvādirūpeṇa pratipādayiṣyamāṇāḥ prācīnoktāḥ śleṣaprasādādayaḥ
GK16visa01cu:896: nanu bhavanmate mādhuryyādayastraya eva guṇāste ca rasamātraniṣṭāḥ /
GK16visa01cu:897: prācīnoktāḥ śleṣaprasādādayaḥ śabdārthaniṣṭatvena viṃsātiprakārāste ca bhavadbhirasvīkṛtatvena ca nirddeṣṭavyāḥ;
GK16visa01cu:900: kintu antarbhāvitvādirūpeṇa śabdārthamātraniṣṭatvāt rasamātraniṣṭaguṇavaijātyāt na pṛthaguktiḥ /
GK16visa01cu:902: na vayaṃ teṣāṃ yathāsambhavaṃ sasadharmatvenoktānāṃ vyañjakatvaṃ na svīkurmaḥ,
